item.title: Troubleshooting Netbeans Slow Startup Time
item.description:
This weekend, I installed NetBeans 8.0.2 and was dismayed that it consistently) took 1' 23" to start. Here’s how I found out what went wrong. Spoiler: itâ€™s a DNS problem.

This post was first published on Medium, but I moved it over here.
